name: YKF Drywall Repair Kit - 18 OZ Spackle Wall Repair Paste with Self Adhesive Mesh & Scraper for Holes, Cracks - Quick and Easy Wall Surface Fix Solution
short_description: 【Complete Repair Kit】- YKF drywall repair kit includes jumbo 18 Oz repair putty, 1 professional scraper, 1 self-adhesive mesh (2'X16.4'), and 1 sandpaper. This bigger size putty gives you more value, so you can fix many wall damages with just one kit.

【Multipurpose Repair Solution】- This spackle repair paste fixes all kinds of wall damage - holes, cracks, dents, nail holes, wall peeling, and scratches. Works great on drywall, plaster, wood, concrete and most interior surfaces in homes, apartments, and offices.

【Waterproof Formula】- Our drywall repair paste is completely waterproof and contains no harmful formaldehyde. It won't shrink, crack or leave streaks after drying. The repaired area becomes virtually invisible after painting, giving your walls a perfect finish.

【Easy to Use】- The wall repair putty applies smoothly and dries fast. Just spread it on the damaged area with the included scraper and wait for it to dry. No special skills needed - anyone can get professional-looking results without hiring contractors.

【Perfect for DIY Projects】- Whether you're fixing small nail holes or larger wall damages, our wall repair putty makes the job easy. The strong adhesion ensures long-lasting repairs, saving you time and money on future fixes. Make your home beautiful again with our professional-grade repair solution.

name: Drywall Repair Kit, 13 Piece Aluminum Wall Repair Patch Kit, 2/4/6/8 inch Aluminum Drywall Patch, Quick Fix Plaster

name: Bates Choice - Drywall Repair Kit, 16pcs, Dry Wall Patch Kits, Wall Repair Patch Kit, Wall Patch Repair Kit, Drywall Hole Patch, Drywall Patch Kit, Wall Hole Repair Kit, Drywall Patch Hole
short_description: Package includes 12 pieces of drywall repair patch in three different sizes (8 pieces of 4-inch, 2 pieces of 6-inch and 2 pieces of 8-inch), 2 pieces of sandpaper (240 grit), and 2 plastic scrapers.
Bates drywall repair patches are made from quality aluminum, making them lightweight yet strong and durable for long-lasting performance.
The self-adhesive backing makes it easy to apply the patch to the wall, ensuring good adhesion to nearly any kind of surface.
Bates wall repair patch is suitable for repairing most damaged surfaces around the home, kitchen, or office building, as well as factories and other industrial facilities.

To use this product effectively, first clean and dry out the hole you want to patch before peeling back the backing and applying the drywall patch. Evenly spread out plaster with a scraper afterwards for a more seamless look.
